title: FUTURE DELIVERY
subtitle: The most wanted
ErrorMessage: Sorry something didn't go well! Please try again!
FAQ1: How can I pay when I ship a package?
FAQ1Answear: The payment method can be selected considering the following payment options accepted by Carro, respectively the payment when picking up the package, the payment by bank transfer or the online payment respecting the terms and conditions included in the application.
FAQContent: We have all sent a package at least once so far using courier services. Although this activity has already entered our daily lives and we immediately adjusted to the ease of fast transmission of packages to loved ones, not infrequently we had questions or concerns that were not as easy to answer. To successfully overcome this challenge, we have prepared for you the most frequently asked questions when it comes to the Carro application, whether you are in the role of sending a package, you are a recipient or delivering packages for Carro.
FAQ2: What commission do I receive for a package delivered through the Carro application?
FAQ2Answear: The value of the applied commission varies depending on the estimated cost of the application and the value paid by the sender of the package.
FAQ3: How do I register as a delivery driver in the Carro application?
FAQ3Answear: The registration process in the application is simple and intuitive: account creation - authentication - race publication
FAQ4: What happens to the personal data registered in the application?
FAQ4Answear: The Carro application is under the incidence of the GDPR regulation, which it respects in all legal aspects. Thus the data entered are confidential, remain in the database and will be used in the user/Carro relationship except for cases of fraud/theft when they can be handed over on request to the competent authorities
FAQ5: What is the payment method for the delivery cost?
FAQ5Answear: Payment is made: cash on receipt; bank transfer or online payment respecting the terms and conditions included in the application
FAQ6: What happens if it is not possible to pick up the package for which I registered (for various reasons such as: improper packaging, packaging damaged at the time takeovers etc.)?
FAQ6Answear: The deciding factor when we face the situation described above remains the driver who registered the race. It is the driver's decision if he wants to pick up the damaged package/improperly packaged package.
FAQ7: What happens if I am the victim of an accident while I registered a race in the application and I took over a package, promising to take it to my destination?
FAQ7Answear: The incident/accident must be reported as soon as possible at no. phone displayed on the platform intended especially for this type of situation!
FAQ8: What happens if the recipient refuses to pick up the package?
FAQ8Answear: The delivery driver will try to contact both the recipient and the sender. The terms and conditions of the Carro application do not include the responsibility assumed by Carro in the case of packages that are refused at the destination. However, an attempt will be made to find a solution optimal (for each case) so that the sender has the possibility to recover the package.
FAQ9: How does Carro meet its environmental sustainability objectives?
FAQ9Answear: The most important objective assumed by Carro in relation to the environmental objectives is the decrease of CO2 emissions due to fuel savings because the transport of parcels is assumed by users, respectively the parcels taken over are transported on pre-scheduled routes.

DeleteNotification: Do you want to delete this notification?
LastNameOnlyLetters: Last name must contain only chars from A-Z and a-z
FirstNameOnlyLetters: First name must contain only chars from A-Z and a-z
PasswordMustContain: Password must contain: at least a special char, a capital letter, a number and from 8 to 20 chars
MinimumAgeForRegister: Minimum age for registration is 14 years old
ValidPhoneNumber: Type a valid phone number (10 numbers)
VerifyDeleteRide: Do you want to delete this ride?
VerifyDeletePackage: Do you want to delete this package?
ValidEstimatedTime: We please you to use only numbers
SmallDescriptionMustContain: Small description must contain at least 1 word
ValidNumberOfPackages: Minumum number of packages that you can add is 1
MinimumCharsDescription: Description must contain at least 25 chars
CashOnDeliverySelected: You selected to pay on delivery, the driver will be there soon! Wait him with the exact amount of cash.
SmallPackageSizeContent: Small package - Width<=30cm, Length<=30cm, Height<=30cm (ex. envelope, shoes box, jewel box, etc.)
MediumPackageSizeContent: Medium package - 30cm<Width<=100cm, 30cm<Length<=100cm, 30cm<Height<=100cm (ex. chair box, bag etc.)
BigPackageSizeContent: Big package - More than a cubic meter
RidesNotFound: Not found any ride on the selected Route
PackagesNotFound: Not found any package on the selected Route
NoRidesAdded: You don't added any ride in your profile!
NoPackagesAdded: You don't added any package in your profile!
NoIteractionWithYourPackage: You don't have any iteracton with this package yet.
